CXR3401.Texto: No focal consolidation, pneumothorax, or pleural effusion. Cardiomediastinal silhouette unremarkable. Stable bilateral calcified granulomas/lymph XXXX. A bullet is present in the posterior soft tissues of the left chest wall, stable compared to prior examination.

Utterance.PhraseText: No focal consolidation, pneumothorax, or pleural effusion.
A bullet is present in the posterior soft tissues of the left chest wall, stable compared to prior examination.
